name: Ghost Knight (Otherside Games)
description:
_____________________________________________________________________________________

Ghost Knight:

📖 Ghost Knight is a platformer action-adventure game with a dark fantasy story style. You will battle against different bosses with different ways to beat them and gain new skills to progress on your journey as Ghost Knight.

🕹️ Controls: [Keyboard | Touch]

  • [W | right corner arrow] = JUMP 🦶🏻
  • [A / S | left arrows] = MOVE 🏃🏻
  • [SPACE | sword button] = ATTACK ⚔️
  • [touch 💬 icon] = talk with the NPC 🍄 Mushin

⚠️This is the DEMO version of the game, the full version will be available in Sept. 2020 on GooglePlay. Freaturing:

  • 5 Epic Bosses;
  • 3 Powers (Skills: 🦶🏻x2|🏹|🛡️👻);
  • A collectable item (🚀)
  • Quest system;
  • Puzzles;
  • 7 NPCs to interact [SPOILERS AHEAD] 🍄 Mushin (The Mushroom), 🕵️ Salesman (The Traveller), 🤖 R0-D1 (The Robot), 🐳 Whalley (The Whale), 🧿 Cycloknight (The Cyclop Knight), 🧞‍♀️ Spirit (The Trapped Soul), 🧚 Lily Hine (The Fairy).

💬 Leave a comment what you think about the game, this can help me to improve it.
